articles.title: Walking more could add as much as 11 years to your life, study says. Here’s how - Fortune
articles.description: Most Americans aren’t hitting recommended exercise per week—but doing more could mean a longer life.
articles.content: Everyone has a different relationship with exercise. You might be a fitness junkie, hitting the gym five days a week or training for a marathon to push your bodys limits. But for most Americans, phys… [+4450 chars]

articles.title: Tropical Storm Sara closes in on ‘life-threatening’ and ‘potentially catastrophic’ impact with Central America - CNN
articles.description: More than two feet of rain could fall and trigger devastating flash flooding and mudslides.
articles.content:
Tropical Storm Sara is unleashing heavy rainfall in northeastern Honduras, with life-threatening flash flooding and mudslides anticipated this weekend, according to the National Hurricane Center.
